question: A floppy disk is a magnetic storage medium for computer systems. What is the size limit of data to be stored on a floppy disk?
explanation: A floppy disk is a type of disk storage composed of a disk of thin and flexible magnetic storage medium.3 1‚ÅÑ2-inch floppy disk can store data up to 360 KB.8-inch floppy disk cab store data up to 2.88 MB.
